general.gigTitle: be your full stack web developer in react js, nodejs, django and custom websites

sellerCard.oneLiner: Creating websites that boost your sales
sellerCard.description:
A team of innovators, and problem solvers—experts in Website, Mobile, and Desktop App Development, SEO, social media strategy, and UI/UX design. Over the past 5 years, we’ve built everything from e-commerce platforms to NFTs and analytics dashboards, all while empowering clients to unlock new levels of sales, profits, and growth.

Let’s take your vision and transform it into something extraordinary that not only stands out but thrives. Let’s create magic together.

description.content:
Are you a startup looking for a custom website solution with hands-on experience in HTML CSS, React, Next JS, and more? Congrats! Your search ends here.


With over 4.5+ years of valuable industry experience, I have the expertise to precisely fit your business needs. Quality is my top priority, I work closely with you to ensure that your website not only meets but exceeds your expectations, helping you achieve your business goals.

 

SERVICES I OFFER

 

  • AI-driven software development
  • SaaS applications
  • E-commerce web applications
  • Management softwares
  • Custom website development (frontend and backend)
  • Website creation from scratch
  • Development in python Django, react js
  • Frontend web development
  • Figma to html, XD to html conversion
  • Database architecture (MySQL, MongoDB, Redis)
  • DevOps - Server management (Azure, AWS, VPS/Linux, DO)
  • Deployments
  • Domain/Hosting Setup


YOU CAN EXPECT


  • Dedicated Support with Regular updates
  • Stress-free development experience
  • One month FREE post development support
  • Successful project delivery
  • Innovative solutions tailored just for you!


Hire me and your satisfaction is GUARANTEED.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am not sure what package is suitable for me?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No worries at all, please contact us right away and we will discuss your requirements and propose solution(s) accordingly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Which technologies do you cover/offer?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We offer comprehensive web design and development services using cutting-edge technologies including Figma, Adobe XD, Photoshop, HTML, CSS, React.js, React Native, MERN stack, Django, PHP (Laravel), and WordPress.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you upload the site to my hosting account/server?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, this service is included in all packages. You just need to provide your hosting account information.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you cover projects related to Blockchain (Crypto Currencies)?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please you may contact us with your requirements before placing the order, we cover all major fields including Blockchain (Crypto Currencies).

questionsAndAnswers.question: Is Domain & hosting included in the package?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, Domain & Hosting are a company's property registered to their name, that is provided by the client but we would love to help you find the best host domain registrar OR do all for you in a custom package Please feel free to contact us anytime and discuss your requirements in details.

packageList.title: Kickstarter - Single Page
packageList.description: A beautiful one-page business website. Have custom requirements? Get free consultation today! 💬🎉

packageList.title: Growth - Small Website/Web App
packageList.description: 2-5 page business website. Have custom requirements? Get free consultation today! 🌐💬

milestones.title: Video meetup
milestones.description: We'll meet (Zoom) to discuss your project.

steps.title: Requirements
steps.description: We'll make sure I have everything needed to complete your project.

milestones.title: Development
milestones.description: I'll develop the website and deliver a working product for your review.

milestones.title: First draft
milestones.description: I'll prepare a first draft of the delivery.

steps.title: Progress check
steps.description: We'll meet to review your project status and the steps needed to finish it.

milestones.title: Modifications
milestones.description: I'll modify assets based on your feedback.

milestones.title: Delivery
milestones.description: I'll send you the final delivery for review and feedback.

reviews.comment: The design phase of my website launch with Hamza got off to a relatively quick start. Hamza has been easy to talk to and immediately understood what I was trying to accomplish. He also provided a valuable outline of the site design both in words and with a prototype on Figma. Great job so far.

I had the absolute pleasure of working with Hamza (developer) and Hassan (designer), and I couldn’t be happier with the results! From start to finish, they went above and beyond to deliver exactly what I needed — and more.

Hamza is a highly skilled developer who tackled every challenge with precision, speed, and creativity. No task was too big or too small for him, and he worked tirelessly to ensure the final product was functional, polished, and efficient.

Hassan brought my vision to life with his incredible design skills. His attention to detail and ability to create beautiful, user-friendly designs was nothing short of impressive.

Both are incredibly hard-working, professional, and reliable. Despite their very reasonable pricing, they provide top-tier quality work and deliver on time — every single time.

If you’re looking for a dedicated team that delivers exceptional value, I wholeheartedly recommend Hamza and Hassan. Don’t hesitate to hire them — you won’t regret it!

Hamza did an outstanding job developing my website. He went above and beyond to ensure everything was perfect, delivering a site that is not only functional but also well-designed and user-friendly (works great on mobile as well!). His attention to detail, responsiveness, and dedication to quality truly set him apart. I couldn’t be happier with the final result and would strongly recommend him to anyone looking for a top-tier web developer. It was my first time using FIVER and the product was brilliant!
it was very easy to communicate and have a common understanding of the project. Hamza has a deep understanding and knows what he's doing. Bugs were fixed fast.
Very professional and organized first phase with our project and It’s coming out so well

consultationData.description: Together in a meeting, we'll sort out the thing you're searching for and how I could help. I will also help you in discussing different scenarios for the idea you have in your mind.
